about_the_game:
Welcome to the chaos of Short Staffed, a hilarious and fast-paced local co-op party experience that will leave you rolling in laughter and chaos!

In Short Staffed, players are thrust into the delightful mayhem of a bustling food and drink establishment. Get ready to serve up a side of laughter as you and your friends take on the roles of zany waitstaff, working tirelessly to fulfil customer orders. You'll need lightning-fast reflexes and a hearty dose of teamwork to keep the orders flowing and the kitchen chaos in check.

Key Features:



Local Co-op Fun: Grab your best buds and dive into the madness together, as you work in sync to juggle orders and hilarious mishaps.

Dynamic Environments: Navigate through a variety of zany restaurant settings, each presenting unique challenges and opportunities for calamity.

Quick to Learn: Simple controls make it easy for players of all skill levels to jump in and start serving.

Whether you're looking for a riotous night of laughter with friends or aiming to test the limits of your coordination, Short Staffed promises an unforgettable co-op gaming experience that will leave you craving more. Can you handle the heat of the kitchen and survive even the most outlandish restaurants? Suit up and get ready to serve up a side dish of chaos like never before!

Short Staffed is the ultimate blend of teamwork, humour, and chaos.


Note: Some levels require at least two players. These levels can be skipped.

name: Short Staffed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller is required for local multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller is required for local multiplayer

short_description: In Short Staffed you are a server who has been tasked with bringing food to customers in a variety of different restaurants. Toss food across the room and jump over customers in this hectic couch co-op game.
